name: Disciple.Tools - Streams
author: Disciple.Tools
upgrade_notice: Upgrade to get the latest features.

sections.description: A stream or hub is a collection of work, large or small. The streams plugin interconnects leaders, disciples, churches, churches, trainings, and other elements with census style reporting. A stream can be a large organization, movement, or a few churches started from a single training. It is a named effort that needs to be tracked for good stewardship.
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
